alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ROOSEVELT, NORTHEASTERN DE BACA, SOUTHERN QUAY AND CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary from thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Wheatland to 6 miles southeast of Ragland to House to 12 miles north of Taiban to near Sumner Lake State Park. Movement of the boundary was south to southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Fort Sumner, Melrose, Grady, House, Saint Vrain, Ranchvale, Taiban, Tolar and Broadview. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 323 and 370. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
